name: Slippy Cube (DriftingSnailStudio)
description:
Practice your agility going through various levels in this amazing, recreational game! Touch right and left side of Your screen to slide the cube and avoid the obstacles!

This is my first game that i made by myself.  It's also available on Google Play Store. I hope You enjoy it!

Credits:
Game Design - Drifting Snail Studio
Art Director - @haint_
Font - xxjjoosengx0xx 1001fonts.com
Music - "Neon Runner" Eric Matyas soundimage.org
